summary: Nestled in the foothills of the Reach, an abandoned cavern filled with life awaits it's next owner...
descriptionHtml:
Name: Falowfield Cavern
Version: 1.0
Date: 1/16/2014
Category: Buildings
Author(s): 132885


Description
===========
Nestled in the foothills of the Reach, an abandoned cavern filled with life awaits it's next owner...

Requirments
===========
Updated Skyrim
Dawnguard
Location
========
Located to the North-West of Whiterun, with map marker visible.

Details
=======
Located just above the water, nestled from the average traveler, sit's Falowfield Cavern. Recently abandoned, it features both cozy accommodations as well as the primitive plant-life.

Install
=======
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)SkyrimData

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Nexus Mod Manager, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the .esp file from SkyrimData



Known Issues or Bugs
====================
You CAN get stuck in the following areas:
next to Mara's shrine.
In the stream.
You never know, somebody might know how to resolve the issue.

History
=======
1.0 - Initial release.



Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
